thread.title: Student group at Howard University demands that Trump be banned as a direct threat to its safe space – twitchy.com
thread.title_full: Student group at Howard University demands that Trump be banned as a direct threat to its safe space – twitchy.com

author: Posted At Pm On February
title: Student group at Howard University demands that Trump be banned as a direct threat to its safe space – twitchy.com
text:
The group also demands that the school declare itself a sanctuary campus, but Howard is far from unique in that regard. @KatMcKinley Fine, lets ban all federal funding to Howard. 
— Deplorable Myiq2xu™ (@realmyiq2xu2) February 13, 2017 @realmyiq2xu2 It is amusing they say in bold letters no "additional funding" So they are all good w/ the $$$ they get now. 
— Kathleen McKinley (@KatMcKinley) February 13, 2017 Trending How DARE they?! NYT Opinion piece tries to shame LGBT Republicans, backfires horribly 
The students might claim not to need any additional federal funding, but it could be a sticking point for the university’s administrators. @HUResist How do you demand the University to ban a sitting President from the campus? How do you think the Uni is funded? 
— Omar Logic (@Blackwoodstar) February 13, 2017 @HUResist ….and free shit….don't forget to demand plenty of free shit 
— Ó Scolaid Òg (@WeWhoDieSaluteU) February 13, 2017 @HUResist OR..you could give people a right to speak and not violate the constitution?Ya got it pretty freakin good already, dudes. 
— ♒Sound ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) (@xLouTheMudkip) February 13, 2017 
* * *
